page.title: 17DANES HILL SCHOOL, OXSHOTT
page.content: At the school, the boys play cricket, rugby and football. The girls play netball and tennis. Both boys and girls swim. There are 4 B.B.C. Micro Computers at the school. Boys like to sail,fish,play games and chess. The girls like to play musical instruments and chess; some do ballet and tap dancing. Cats are one of the most popular pets in their homes. Favourite T.V. programmes are Cover Up, Dallas and the Cosby Show but they do not watch much T.V. as they have practising and homework to do. The boys hope to go to Epsom College, City Freeman's, Sherbourne, St. John's Leatherhead, Tonbridge, Reeds or Shewsbury after Danes Hill. The girls hope to go to Claremont, St. Catherine's, Parsons Mead or Lady Eleanor Holles.
